faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about contacting us and getting support.

questions.question: How can I contact your support team?
questions.answer: You can contact us via live chat, email (support@tradenmore.com), or by filling out our contact form. We're available Monday-Friday, 6 AM-6 PM GMT.

questions.question: How quickly will you respond to my inquiry?
questions.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent technical issues, live chat provides the fastest response.

questions.question: What information should I include when contacting support?
questions.answer: Please include your account number (if applicable), a detailed description of your issue, and any relevant screenshots. This helps us assist you more efficiently.

questions.question: Do you provide support in multiple languages?
questions.answer: Yes, our support team provides assistance in English and Arabic. Additional language support may be available upon request.

questions.question: Can I schedule a call with your team?
questions.answer: Yes, you can request a scheduled call by contacting us through any of our channels. We'll arrange a convenient time for both parties.

questions.question: What should I do if I can't access my account?
questions.answer: If you're experiencing account access issues, contact our technical support team immediately at tech@tradenmore.com or through live chat for immediate assistance.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.subtitle: Our support team is standing by to help you with any questions or concerns.
